LPF Editor Comment: refined composition differs from nominal composition. LPF Editor Comment: density computed from chemical formula differs by > 5 % from published calculated density (from refinement). Sample Source or Locality: Specimen from Kovdor massif, Kola Peninsula, Russian Federation. Structures: Polytype structure: 3R. Temperature of Data Collection: 293 K (20°C). Test from external database: number of formula units Z is assumed to be misprinted as 3 instead of 1/2;in table 2;. Minor Warning: Minor warning from the LPF Editor exist. LPF comment on minor error in the publication exist. LPF Editor comment on unusual interatomic distance exist. Significant Warning: Density calculated using chemical formula and reported structure differ by 4.042%. Wyckoff Sequence: g c3 b a.
